name: playwright-cloud-killercoda-test
description: Test script for Playwright Cloud on Killercoda Kubernetes playground

scripts.test-with-port-forward: kubectl port-forward -n playwright-cloud service/pw-server 3000:3000 & sleep 3 && PW_TEST_CONNECT_WS_ENDPOINT=ws://localhost:3000/ node test-in-killercoda.js; kill %1

author: Playwright Cloud Demo
